title.rendered: Applicature Lands First Place Among Top 10 IDO Development Companies

content.rendered:
Top Placement

Applicature is proud to be placed among the top IDO development companies in the world, according to a recent Medium post written by Ankit Thakor.

Applicature is able to implement all blockchain essential projects and maintenance, including, but not limited to:

  • Full-Cycle Technical Supply
  • Workable Project Solutions
  • Smart-Contract Development
  • White Paper Consulting
  • Token Concept Design
  • Smart-Contract Audits
  • ICO Marketing
  • ICO Cabinets
  • ICO Launches

Meet the Applicature Tech Team

The Applicature team is a prime example of success coupled with competence and technical prowess. More than 30 smart-contract projects have already been delivered, thanks to Applicature’s cutting-edge knowledge, expertise, and stellar tech team.

Here is a listing of a few projects from our portfolio:

  • Cryptofights
  • SupplyBloc
  • Howdoo
  • Developeo
  • Orocrypt
  • Varcrypt
  • Coinspark

The best way to plan a successful project is through top-notch security. Applicature offers internal audits, autotest coverage, manual testing, and code review, among other security-centric services.

Applicature’s experts are able to detect all vulnerabilities with thorough due diligence across all stages of the project. We have assisted our clients in avoiding crucial mistakes with exhaustive bug reporting, error detection, KYC, and AML integration in order to deliver state-of-the-art ICO website security.

Step by Step

AEPoS, Applicature Ethereum Proof of Stake Consensus Protocol
Applicature created AEPoS in order to secure and stabilize transactions in banking, the supply chain, marketing, and loyalty programs. You can read all about AEPoS here.

Bounty Management System
BMS software helps distribute rewards for social media activity, making it easy to maintain your marketing campaigns and advertise your product effectively.

Questions on BMS? Contact Applicature for an introductory consultation!
